sentences.en: Intoxicate in green mountain green water between, enjoy natural baptism.
sentences.cn: 陶醉在青山绿水间, 享受自然的洗礼.

sentences.en: It can selectively bind with cancer cells overexpressing EGF receptor ( EGFR ) and intoxicate them.
sentences.cn: 它可以特异性识别EGF受体过度表达的癌细胞,具有特异杀伤癌细胞的作用.

sentences.en: Make it rich as a draught of poppies to intoxicate me.
sentences.cn: 你的信像一束盛开的罂粟使我麻醉.

sentences.en: Note: The name honeysuckle comes from the sweet nectar flower produces to intoxicate the greedy bee.
sentences.cn: 注释: 忍冬用产生的甘露迷醉贪婪的蜜蜂,由此而得名(忍冬英文一词是由“蜂蜜”和“吮吸”两组成).

sentences.en: Power will intoxicate the best hearts as wine the strong - est heads.
sentences.cn: 权力毒害最善良的心灵,有如烈酒迷惑最精明的头脑.

sentences.en: Their Name, their Garb, and Work did so intoxicate and bewitch me.
sentences.cn: 他们的名气, 服饰和作品确实使我陶醉,令我着迷.

sentences.en: To know that a touch of wine can intoxicate my mind.
sentences.cn: 要知道,淡淡的酒香也能醉人心头.

sentences.en: Wine has the power to intoxicate.

words.tran_cn: 醉人的；令人陶醉的；使兴奋的
使陶醉；醉酒；使中毒（intoxicate的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: (of an alcoholic drink) to produce in (a person) a state ranging from euphoria to stupor, usually accompanied by loss of inhibitions and control; make drunk; inebriate

trans.tran_cn: 使喝醉，使陶醉， 使激动不已， 使欣喜若狂
